article.title: U.S. Army National Guard Awards Virtual Combat Trainers Contract to Raydon
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raydon Corporation, Daytona Beach, Florida, was recently awarded a more than $15 million contract to provide 21 virtual combat operations trainers upgraded from version 1.1 to version 3.1.Â The National Guard Bureau Operational Contracting Center, Arlington, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
